definition: alone and helpless/also written 零丁

sentences.english: Now I'm single and I have no friends. FML
sentences.chinese: 而現在，我一個人孤苦伶仃，沒有女友也沒有朋友。

sentences.english: The Simurgh saw the helpless babe lying at the foot of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 西默夫看見這個孤苦伶仃的嬰兒躺在山腳下。

sentences.english: In music she had been always used to feel alone in the world;
sentences.chinese: 在音樂這個天地裏，她歷來總是感到孤苦伶仃的。

sentences.english: The simurgh saw the helpless babe lying at the foot of the mountain .
sentences.chinese: 西默夫看見這個孤苦伶仃的嬰兒躺在山腳下。

sentences.english: She was emaciated by long illness.
sentences.chinese: 長期的疾病把她折磨得瘦骨伶仃。

sentences.english: Analysis of sediment grain size showed that the grain size grade changed greatly in the Pearl estuary.
sentences.chinese: 珠江口伶仃洋及鄰近海域沉積物粒級變化大。

sentences.english: The 4)waif-like Patti thought this was a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 瘦骨伶仃的帕蒂認爲這是個不錯的主意。

sentences.english: The death of his family in the flood left him completely desolate.
sentences.chinese: 在大洪水中他家人喪失使他孤苦伶仃。

sentences.english: One should have pity on the beggar in the street.
sentences.chinese: 那個孤苦伶仃的孩子引起了我們的同情。

sentences.english: While I felt safe, I was also isolated.
sentences.chinese: 儘管感到安全，但我還是覺得孤苦伶仃。

sentences.english: We all lived in one little house and we were a scrawny lot.
sentences.chinese: 我們全家住在一套小房子裏面，個個瘦骨伶仃的。

sentences.english: That's why even Mom says you will end up a lonely guy.
sentences.chinese: 這就是連老媽都說你以後會孤苦伶仃一個人。

sentences.english: Dynamics of soil seed bank of exotic weed Mikania micrantha populations in three communities in Neilingding Island were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了內伶仃島不同羣落中薇甘菊土壤種子庫動態。

definition: to be alone/to stand in isolation
with only body and shadow to comfort each other (idiom)/extremely sad and lonely
variant of 飄零|飘零[piao1 ling2]
lit. a lonely body with only a shadow for company/to be all alone (idiom)
to float in the wind/by ext., to lead a wandering life
